name: Call to Arms
summary: Call to Arms offers an innovative mix of real-time strategy and 3rd, as well as 1st person controls. Set in the time of modern warfare, the game offers realistically modeled vehicles and heavy weaponry, as well as dozens of firearms and customizations.
info:
• 中文名: 战争召唤
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: RTS / FPS
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2018年4月27日
  • 开发: Digitalmindsoft
  • 发行: Digitalmindsoft
